# MedMos demo

## Overview

This is a demo version of a CRUD application for tracking and managing orders build with [React](https://react.dev/), [Redux](https://redux.js.org/), [MUI](https://mui.com/). The application is part of a pilot project for supply planning at [MedMos](https://med-mos.ru/).

## Usage

The main page is a list of orders grouped by main attributes. The list is implemented as a [Material React Table](https://v2.material-react-table.com/)-based view with server sorting, filtering and pagination.

<p align="center">
<img src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/64905854/437084920-388e5e48-5b6d-464e-92c7-458119b3995d.gif?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..nqTWk13nTejQhia2Cx9aWhxUj-VbGskNU0OLmICooDc">
</p><br/>

New orders are created by exporting json files with format and content verification of the uploaded data.

<p align="center">
<img src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/64905854/437085078-63b00aa4-2944-44f2-960b-cd8fc7b63437.gif?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..uDaclXlXZWXvHI8hgao6HEJIrkEthNiRY-wwa0sffk8">
</p><br/>

Viewing the details of a specific order is implemented through a separate application page, where you can add new items and reference values.

<p align="center">
<img src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/64905854/437085191-86ef14b6-ce5b-4efb-ab8c-e77e0aa9a89a.gif?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..8mZJqh8ncSbxzbkeiEMJ1XrRjJnZykmSEMmb4mpiId8">
</p><br/>

The user has the ability to edit the delivery status and reserve individual items on the stock.

<p align="center">
<img src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/64905854/437085352-49a379a0-f2b3-4ff2-9972-2370193b555a.gif?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..OQLKEgctResuYX0tcViGlAtVnEAZXmHLYjIxW_BlAkk">
</p><br/>

For further analysis and order planning, it is possible to download data as an Excel file.

<p align="center">
<img src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/64905854/437085516-69a3a694-1104-4e68-a585-77579da19b9c.gif?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..6SGniFL3Ey-8OTxTF9Z0VdEAl5hcsT3-s1f0U9t95Xs">
</p>
